messages.title: Re-Elect Anne Main
messages.content: Anne works 100% for you and your family. No second job or outside interests. No lobbying. Anne is hardworking, effective and unafraid to rebel or take tough decisions. Anne always puts St Albans first. Your voice in Westminster not Westminster's voice in St Albans.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting the deficit by half as a share of national income, delivering the fastest growing major economy.
1.85m more people in jobs, no NI paid on those under 21yrs. 2m more apprenticeships, giving opportunities to young people.
Capped the increase of benefits to 1% and made work pay. Increased the personal tax allowance to £10,600.
Increased the state pension by £800 - the biggest ever cash rise. Implemented the Triple-lock pension guarantee.

leaflet.personalStatement: Anne works 100% for you and your family. No second job or outside interests. No lobbying.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by J. West, on behalf of St Albans Conservatives, both of 114G High Street, London Colney, Herts, AL2 1QL

images.caption: Anne Main engaging in discussions, public speaking and interacting with constituents.
